resources.string: To use SnapNotify, you must setup your own notification server (it\'s super easy though). See http://sagark.org/snapnotify/ for a guide.

SnapNotify was developed by Sagar Karandikar. 

Find out more at http://sagark.org/snapnotify/ 

Found bugs? Send an email to apps@sagark.org 

This is an early release. Although everything should work, there is no guarantee of functionality and no warranty or support is implied.
